info.task: navigate forwards to link in dropdown
info.title: Navigate forwards to a link in a dropdown in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToFirstLinkInDropdown
setupScript.description: sets the state of the first disclosure button to expanded, and sets focus on the first link of the associated dropdown

user: With the reading cursor on a link in the first dropdown, navigate to the next link.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on a link in the first dropdown, navigate to the next link.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.
